content: radical here we have ninja turtle amigurumi in a crew of 4 they each have their own colorful bandana to tell them apart these baby crochet turtles aren t quite teenagers yet but they re in training to master the ancient martial arts of ninjutsu with this free crochet pattern use your own crochet ninjutsu to create your very own crew of ninja turtle amigurumis they may be very hungry though and so be prepared to feed them lots of pizza with anchovies video tutorial is also available along with the written pattern happy crocheting cheers ami amour ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **instagram** make sure you tag me with your projects on instagram @ami_amour 1 i d love to see **youtube** check out my youtube channel 2 to catch all my crochet tutorials and projects ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **approximate size ** 3 5/9cm tall **level ** easy **need to know ** single_crochet slip_stitch chain stitch crochet in the round how to increase how to decrease how to sew parts together 1 https //www instagram com/ami_amour 2 https //www youtube com/c/amiamour
